subject: p12699874
History: Evaluation of the patient with right-sided pleural effusion and dullness at the right base on auscultation.
Findings: PA and lateral upright chest radiographs were reviewed in comparison to. Heart size is top normal, stable. Mediastinum is stable. Left lung is clear. Right pleural effusion is redemonstrated, small associated with right lower lobe opacity most likely reflecting atelectasis. There is no pneumothorax.
